Title: Video
Description: Platforms for sharing and streaming video content.

Platforms.Name: YouTube
Platforms.Description: The largest video-sharing platform.

Platforms.Name: Vimeo
Platforms.Description: A platform for high-quality video content.

Platforms.Name: Dailymotion
Platforms.Description: A popular video-sharing website.

Platforms.Name: Twitch
Platforms.Description: A live streaming platform for gamers.

Platforms.Name: TikTok
Platforms.Description: A platform for short-form mobile videos.

Title: Audio
Description: Platforms for streaming and sharing audio content.

Platforms.Name: Spotify
Platforms.Description: A music streaming service.

Platforms.Name: Apple Music
Platforms.Description: Apple's music streaming service.

Platforms.Name: SoundCloud
Platforms.Description: A platform for sharing and discovering music.

Platforms.Name: Tidal
Platforms.Description: A high-fidelity music streaming service.

Platforms.Name: Deezer
Platforms.Description: A music streaming service with a large catalog.

Title: Podcast
Description: Platforms for listening to and sharing podcasts.

Platforms.Name: Spotify Podcasts

Platforms.Name: Stitcher
Platforms.Description: A podcast app with a large selection.

Platforms.Name: Pocket Casts

Platforms.Name: Medium
Platforms.Description: A platform for publishing and reading articles.

Platforms.Name: Substack
Platforms.Description: A platform for writing and sending newsletters.

Platforms.Name: Ghost

Platforms.Name: Blogger

Platforms.Name: LinkedIn
